Name: Pino Pepe
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Pineapple shell (frozen) glass .
DRY BLEND (without ice) first 7 ingredients (all but Xanthan gum) on a slow setting and gradually add Xanthan while continuing to blend.
Add 7oz scoop of crushed ice and BLEND some more.
Review: To quote Trader Vic, "Lethal but smooth - pineapple at its best".
History: Adapted from a recipe in Victor Bergeron 's 1972 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide (Revised Edition) .
